#summary Click Tracker Feature List
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

=Click Tracker Feature List – 16.01.2011=
This is the current list of programmed and planned features.

You can support financially the implementation of any of these features, or comission specific features or enhancements directly from the author (for example, with [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=912854 Paypal]). 

To program a specific feature [mailto:jmmmpais@googlemail.com?&body=Hi%20João,%0A%0a contact me] with your ideas, and I'll give you a quote.
